message.body: Good new baby! I got free shipping for the free people hat so it only cost me $20. Annnnnd, I tried the mouthwash and it was fine! So weird!
Oh good good!! Glad that worked out, my love :) Made it to work. But can you do me a big favor? Can you check what time the Virginia Square metro opens? Thanks!
Yeah yeah! Uhhh. Trains don't leave till 7. Says first train is 5:06 (m-f) and exactly 2 hours later Saturday and Sunday.
Oh wait...I need to know which train. Sorry.
Nope, you got it my love. Guess its 7:06...which is good enough i suppose. Thank you, darling! Means i'll see ya around 8 tho :-/
You sure? Different trains have different start times. I looked at greenbelt for example and it said first train came at 4 something.
As long as theres one close to when i get out at 6:30 we're good. Need V. Square station though. Greenbelt no help hehe
I assume its ok tho. No worries my love. You relax and enjoy. I'll be next to you when you wake up!
